Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Directs the authorities budget office to conduct a study on the financial effects of making local governments responsible for the upkeep in certain public areas
Summary: Directs the authorities budget office to conduct a study on the financial effects of making local governments responsible for the upkeep in certain public areas immediately outside of properties owned or leased by public authorities.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the authorities budget office to conduct a study on the financial effects of making local governments responsible for upkeep in public areas immediately outside of properties owned or leased by public authorities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
